meanings.sent1: The franklins in our town take care of the fields.
meanings.sent2: The franklins attended the community meeting about land rights.
meanings.sent3: The franklins had a picnic on their vast property.
meanings.sent4: The franklins' acres stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The franklins' ownership of the land was unquestioned.

meanings.definition: A U.S. banknote with a face value of $100.
meanings.sent1: She paid for the concert tickets with a few franklins.
meanings.sent2: He always carried a couple of franklins in his wallet.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted franklins.
meanings.sent4: Her savings were hidden in a jar filled with franklins.
meanings.sent5: The cashier handed back change in franklins.

meanings.definition: A person who is wealthy or well-off.
meanings.sent1: The franklins in the neighborhood drove luxury cars.
meanings.sent2: She was known as one of the local franklins.
meanings.sent3: The franklins hosted a charity event at their mansion.
meanings.sent4: His generosity made him a true franklins among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The franklins' lifestyle was the envy of many.
